doc:
Bob Saget https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Saget 0 Robert Lane Saget (; born May 17, 1956) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, and television host. His television roles include Danny Tanner on the ABC sitcom Full House (1987–95) and its Netflix sequel Fuller House, and hosting America's Funniest Home Videos from 1989 to 1997. Saget is also known for his adult-oriented stand-up routine. He also provided the voice of the future Ted Mosby on the CBS sitcom How I Met Your Mother from 2005 to 2014. Saget's 2014 comedy album, That's What I'm Talkin' About, was nominated for the Grammy Award for Best Comedy Album. Robert_Lane_Saget ( ; born May_17_,_1956 ) is an_American_stand-up_comedian , actor , and television_host . His_television_roles include Danny_Tanner on the_ABC_sitcom Full_House_(_1987 – 95_) and its_Netflix_sequel_Fuller_House , and hosting America 's_Funniest_Home_Videos from 1989 to 1997 . Saget is_also_known for his_adult-oriented_stand-up_routine . He also provided the_voice of the_future_Ted_Mosby on the_CBS_sitcom How I Met Your_Mother from 2005 to 2014 . Saget 's 2014_comedy album , That 's What I 'm_Talkin ' About , was_nominated for the_Grammy_Award for_Best_Comedy_Album .
